content: We just might be big TROUBLE. All of these people take an Oath of Office. However, I seem to immediately forget that Oath and obey, do, or act according to the Party they are associated with. GOD, COUNTRY, FAMILY is supposed to be the way. These people do not believe that. They believe and or show us that it is. PARTY, BACKERS of the Party, AGENDA, COUNTRY, FAMILY(?), and maybe GOD. EVERY Citizen has the RIGHT to VOTE — NO EXCEPTIONS RELIGIOUS LIBERTY does NOT mean you can IMPOSE and FORCE your beliefs on me, Violating my FREEDOM of RELIGION The Pledge of Allegiance ends with “LIBERTY and JUSTICE for ALL” There is NO list of EXCEPTIONS.
